mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(student.`stu_id`) AS alreadstay, s.* FROM student RIGHT JOIN (SELECT room.*, floor.`building_id`, floor.`floor_num` FROM room LEFT JOIN FLOOR ON ( floor.`floor_id` = room.`floor_id` ) WHERE room.`room_num` LIKE #{buildingNum} AND floor.`floor_num` LIKE #{floorNum}) s ON (s.room_id = student.`room_id`) GROUP BY s.room_id order by s.room_num
mapper.update: update room set cost=#{cost}, total_bed=#{totalBed} where room_num=#{roomNum}
